definitions: deity who dwelt on Mount Olympus in Greek mythology
person of superior abilities or achievements standing above ordinary mortals
examples: The ancient Greeks believed Olympians controlled human destiny
Zeus was the most powerful Olympian among the twelve gods
She moved through the boardroom with Olympian confidence
The scientist maintained an Olympian detachment from daily concerns

definitions: countries of Asia especially East Asia collectively known as the East
examples: Merchants brought silk and spices from the Orient
Marco Polo's travels to the Orient fascinated Europeans

definitions: academic field studying Asian cultures languages and peoples from Western perspective
artistic and literary movement depicting Asian themes in Western works
examples: Edward Said criticized traditional orientalism for its biased views
The university established a department of orientalism in 1850
The museum's orientalism collection features nineteenth-century paintings
French orientalism influenced decorative arts throughout Europe

definitions: golden statuette awarded annually by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
examples: She won an Oscar for best supporting actress last year
The film received seven Oscar nominations including best picture

definitions: upholstered footstool or low seat without back or arms
historical empire ruled by Turkish dynasties from 1299 to 1922
examples: She propped her feet on the leather ottoman while reading
The ottoman matched perfectly with the living room sofa
The Ottoman Empire once controlled much of southeastern Europe
Ottoman architecture influenced building styles across three continents

definitions: flat board marked with letters and numbers used to communicate with spirits
examples: The teenagers scared themselves playing with a Ouija board
The Ouija pointer moved mysteriously across the lettered surface

definitions: collective term for Oxford and Cambridge universities in England
examples: An Oxbridge education opens many doors in British society
The Oxbridge rowing rivalry dates back over 150 years

definitions: personal digital assistant electronic device for organizing information before smartphones
examples: Business executives relied on PDAs to manage their schedules
The PDA synchronized data with desktop computers via cable

definitions: pelvic inflammatory disease affecting female reproductive organs often from bacterial infection
examples: Untreated PID can lead to serious fertility complications
The doctor prescribed antibiotics to treat the patient's PID

definitions: prisoner of war captured enemy combatant held during armed conflict
examples: The POW camp held thousands of soldiers during the conflict
International law protects POWs from torture and mistreatment

definitions: public service announcement broadcast message serving public interest
prostate specific antigen blood test screening for prostate cancer
examples: The television PSA warned viewers about drunk driving dangers
The government funded PSAs about childhood vaccination benefits
His doctor recommended annual PSA tests after age fifty
Elevated PSA levels may indicate prostate health issues

definitions: Pacific Standard Time zone eight hours behind Coordinated Universal Time
examples: California businesses operate on PST during winter months
The conference call is scheduled for 2 PM PST

definitions: parent teacher organization supporting school activities and fundraising efforts
paid time off employee benefit combining vacation and sick leave
examples: The PTO raised funds for new playground equipment this year
Parents volunteer through the PTO to help with school events
Employees accrue PTO hours based on their years of service
She requested PTO for her upcoming family vacation

definitions: post traumatic stress disorder mental condition triggered by experiencing terrifying events
examples: Veterans often struggle with PTSD after returning from combat zones
Therapy helps many PTSD sufferers process their traumatic memories

definitions: polyvinyl chloride synthetic plastic polymer used in pipes and construction materials
examples: The plumber installed PVC pipes throughout the new house
PVC flooring resists water damage better than wood

definitions: pressurized water reactor nuclear power plant using water under high pressure
examples: The PWR design prevents boiling in the reactor core
Most nuclear plants worldwide use PWR technology for safety

definitions: Earth's largest ocean covering one third of the planet's surface
examples: Ships cross the Pacific between Asia and the Americas
The Pacific contains thousands of islands and coral atolls

definitions: flooded field where rice is grown in standing water
examples: Farmers plant rice seedlings in the flooded paddy fields
The paddy terraces cascade down the mountainside beautifully

definitions: priest or minister serving as chaplain especially in military forces
examples: Soldiers sought comfort from the padre before the battle
The padre conducted services for troops stationed overseas

definitions: person from Pakistan or of Pakistani descent
examples: The Pakistani community celebrates Independence Day every August
Many Pakistanis immigrated to Britain after partition

definitions: Old Stone Age earliest period of human culture using primitive stone tools
examples: Palaeolithic cave paintings show early human artistic expression
Hunter gatherers lived in small groups during Palaeolithic times

definitions: Old Stone Age earliest period of human culture using primitive stone tools
examples: Paleolithic humans developed basic tools from chipped stones
The Paleolithic diet mimics what ancient humans supposedly ate

definitions: supposed cure for all diseases or solution to all problems
examples: Politicians promised their plan was a panacea for economic woes
No single medicine serves as a panacea for every illness

definitions: first woman in Greek mythology who released evils into the world
examples: Pandora opened the forbidden box despite clear warnings
The myth of Pandora explains the origin of human suffering

definitions: prehistoric landmass containing all Earth's continents before they drifted apart
examples: Scientists believe Pangaea began breaking apart 175 million years ago
Fossil evidence supports the theory that Pangaea once existed

definitions: prehistoric landmass containing all Earth's continents before they drifted apart
examples: Pangea's breakup created the Atlantic Ocean between continents
Similar fossils on different continents prove Pangea existed

definitions: Italian sandwich pressed and grilled on ridged plates served hot
examples: The cafe serves delicious panini with mozzarella and tomatoes
She ordered a chicken pesto panini for her lunch

definitions: place or state of perfect happiness like heaven or Eden
examples: The tropical island seemed like paradise to weary travelers
Many religions describe paradise as the ultimate reward

definitions: elected member serving in a parliament or legislative assembly
expert in parliamentary procedure and rules governing legislative bodies
examples: The parliamentarian voted against the controversial new tax bill
Parliamentarians debated the issue for several heated hours
The organization hired a parliamentarian to ensure proper meeting conduct
The parliamentarian ruled the motion was out of order

definitions: ancient temple on Athens Acropolis dedicated to goddess Athena
examples: Tourists flock to see the Parthenon's magnificent marble columns
The Parthenon represents the pinnacle of ancient Greek architecture

definitions: unit of pressure equal to one newton per square meter
structured programming language developed for teaching computer science
examples: The tire pressure gauge displayed readings in pascals
Atmospheric pressure at sea level equals 101325 pascals
Students learned Pascal before moving to more complex languages
The Pascal compiler caught many common programming errors

definitions: Jewish festival commemorating the Israelites' exodus from slavery in Egypt
examples: Families gather for the Passover seder meal each spring
During Passover, observant Jews avoid eating leavened bread

definitions: person who helps end disputes and restore harmony between opposing parties
examples: The diplomat acted as peacemaker between the warring nations
She earned respect as the family's peacemaker during arguments

definitions: genus of fungi including species that produce the antibiotic penicillin
examples: Scientists discovered penicillium mold could kill harmful bacteria
Blue cheese gets its flavor from harmless penicillium cultures

definitions: geometric figure with five straight sides and five angles
headquarters building of United States Department of Defense near Washington
examples: Students learned to calculate the area of a regular pentagon
The stop sign's shape resembles a red octagon not pentagon
Officials at the Pentagon announced new military spending plans
The Pentagon houses thousands of defense department employees

definitions: Christian celebration fifty days after Easter commemorating the Holy Spirit's descent
examples: Churches decorate with red flowers and banners for Pentecost Sunday
Pentecost marks the birth of the Christian church

definitions: member of Protestant churches emphasizing direct personal experience with God
examples: The Pentecostal congregation practiced speaking in tongues during worship
Pentecostal churches have grown rapidly in Latin America

definitions: person from Iran formerly known as Persia or of Iranian descent
long-haired breed of domestic cat with flat face and fluffy coat
examples: Many Persians celebrate Nowruz as their new year festival
The Persian merchant sold beautiful handwoven carpets
Her Persian cat required daily brushing to prevent matted fur
Persian cats often win prizes at international cat shows

definitions: transparent thermoplastic material used as lightweight alternative to glass
examples: The museum displayed artifacts behind protective Perspex barriers
Aircraft windows often use Perspex instead of heavy glass

definitions: person from Peru or of Peruvian descent
examples: The Peruvian guide explained ancient Incan building techniques
Peruvian cuisine combines indigenous and Spanish culinary traditions

definitions: Hebrew name for Passover festival celebrating freedom from Egyptian slavery
examples: Observant Jews clean their homes thoroughly before Pesach begins
The Pesach story teaches important lessons about freedom

definitions: colorful trumpet-shaped flower popular in gardens and hanging baskets
examples: Purple petunias cascaded from the window boxes all summer
She planted petunias along the garden path for continuous blooms
